<h1 id="1.-Definition">1. Definition<a class="anchor-link" href="#1.-Definition"> </a></h1><p>Regression analysis is a set of statistical processes for estimating the relationships between a dependent variable (often called the 'outcome' or 'response' variable) and one or more independent variables (often called 'predictors', 'covariates', 'explanatory variables' or 'features').</p>
